Literature.Title: Antimicrobial Peptide from the Wild Bee Hylaeus signatus Venom and Its Analogues: Structure-Activity Study and Synergistic Effect with Antibiotics.
Literature.Author: Nesuta O, Hexnerová R, Budesínský M, Slaninová J, Bednárová L, Hadravová R, Straka J, Veverka V, Cerovský V

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=13µM),Staphylococcus aureus 1(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=6.7µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=2.5µM),Escherichia coli B(MIC=10µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=7.9µM),Micrococcus luteus CCM 144(MIC=<=3µM),Bacillus subtilis 168(MIC=<=7µM),Candida albicans F7-39/IDE99(MIC=10µM)
